author: Andreas
content:
Molto rapido ðŸ™‚ Grazie tanto.

Hope you don't mind when I continue in English. My Italian is next to inexistent, which is really a shame.

For me, probably the most interesting thing was, that it had happened so near to Carinthia. It took us no more than 3 hours to reach the site - and I had never even heard of it!

Thanks again.
